item.title: Reporting Errors in Production: The Type/Stack Conflict
item.description: Lately, my team and I have started reporting errors to Sentry, and I hate to admit it, but only then did I notice that my errors werenâ€™t telling me much.

item.title: Dynamic Ducks vs. Static Gophers
item.description: Since I started my first programming job three years ago, I have only had the opportunity to work with Ruby and Javascript. As with most new web companies, this was the language their code was already written in.
